page.title: 05FOUR MARKS B M X CLUB
page.content: B M X: A BMX is a stunt bike and it has a triangular frame with V shaped handle bars, 2 wheels, pedals, chain, front and back brake, and pads. At the recreation ground there is going to be a BMX track. It will be open all day, 7 days a week and will be used by all ages. Young children must be supervised. Children will be riding at their own risk. You must keep the pads on your bike for safety. It is important that you should wear arm and knee pads but most important you should wear a helmet. The bikes should be well looked after. Maintenance of the track is done by volunteers. There are many stunts you can do on a BMX including "Endo", "Wheelie" and "American Bunny Hops" (a bit of the first two stunts put together).
